headline: Republican and Democratic campaign committees are spending an average 700% MORE on security than in the last election cycle: Ted Cruz, AOC, Liz Cheney and Mark Kelly top lawmakers' $3 MILLION protection bill over increased threats
author: Emily Goodin
sentences:

Some of the most prominent and high-profile names in politics were its top spenders on security: Senators Mark Kelly and Ted Cruz; and Representatives Liz Cheney and Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez.
In 2021, the campaign committees for lawmakers from both parties noted nearly $3 million for security-related spending, according to a CQ Roll Call analysis of federal election records.
